name: Bed Head Rock N Roller Clamp Free 2-in-1 Curling Wand | Round Barrel for Tousled Waves
short_description: UNIQUE BARREL SHAPE: Bubble shape creates tousled waves or defined spirals with defined texture.
TOURMALINE CERAMIC COATING: Helps reduce damage from over-styling with even heat distribution that helps seal the hair cuticle and boost shine.
ALL HAIR TYPES: Select the ideal styling level for your hair from multiple heat settings up to 400ºF for precise control in all hair types.
ADVANCED: Clamp-free design for no-nonsense styling. Heat protective glove included safer styling
GET THE LOOK: Start with dry hair, grab a 1-inch section of hair, and wrap it around the barrel, point the barrel down while curling and hold in place for a few seconds, release.
product_description: Tousled waves and tempting texture. Loud texture and outrageous, Amped-up body are yours with the bed head rock N roller tourmaline ceramic 2-In-1 styling iron. You’ll be ready to party all night with curls that totally rock. This rounded barrel was designed for versatility to deliver different types of texture-- Loose tousled curls and waves. High heat up to 400° F quickly locks in the curl with a clamp-free wrap-and-go design that leaves no creases behind and a natural-looking finish. Tourmaline ceramic helps to reduce frizz and lock in shine for amazing body throughout. The bed head rock N' roller tourmaline ceramic styling iron also comes with a bonus heat-protective glove and a tangle-free swivel cord that make it easy to style with. Dual voltage for worldwide use means you can take this baby with you anywhere you go. How it works: Wrap a 1" section of hair around the barrel leaving the ends out. For looser curls, wrap the hair around the balls of the barrel, or in-between for tighter curls.
